entries.title: Domain-driven Project Structure
entries.summary: Organize by domain/package to scale monoliths; keep routers/schemas/services together per domain.
entries.content: Prefer domain-driven structure for large apps: each domain package contains router/schemas/models/service/dependencies.

code_examples.code:
src/
  auth/
    router.py
    schemas.py
    service.py
    dependencies.py
  users/
    router.py
    schemas.py
    service.py
